Using Sphinx¶

This document is a small test and also a little tutorial that can help you generate beatifull documents using some parameters shown bellow.

Presentation¶

learn using sphinx to simply generate documentation can save you a lot of time and you’ll find in this page command line that I used to make it looks like this.

Usefull Parameters¶

  • Warnings

Warning

use parameter “.. warning:: ” to create a warning like this.

  • Lists

You can use several types of lists in your documents.

  • This is a bulleted list.

  1. this is a numbered list.

  2. this is also a numbered list.
